{"images":[{"width":2602,"height":3904,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220913/2022091306081014585173.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2402,"height":3674,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220913/2022091306081046588011.jpg","idx":1},{"width":2726,"height":3689,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220913/2022091306081044335036.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第八十三天，就在某一瞬间好像找到了毛笔在写字中富有弹性的感觉，貌似笔毛有些听话了，写的线条也略生动了一点。心还是蛮静的，要抓住一闪而逝的感觉，不能心浮气躁。但明天要好好体会并继续注意老师说的：结构不准你就一笔一笔写，看准了再下笔。 不准就再慢。下笔多看几眼，然后下笔。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3904,"height":2928,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220912/2022091211581831146100.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第八十二天，心乱，字飘，线躁，既然作业太丑，不好意思交，那就卷起来交啦~最近心有些散，容易被某些事情所扰，而静不下心来，这是写不好字的最大阻碍，说明修炼的还是远远不够。但练字的过程，也是成长的过程，不着急，慢慢来就好。✊🏻","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3904,"height":2811,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220911/2022091110084331723135.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第八十一天，今日状态不好，明日再战！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2349,"height":3700,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220910/2022091001323645886685.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3906,"height":2926,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220910/2022091001323841564248.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3906,"height":2926,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220910/2022091001323894620556.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第八十天，欲得妙于笔，当得妙于心。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3873,"height":2850,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220909/2022090910130572350842.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2388,"height":3685,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220909/2022090910130573279621.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第七十九天，精临之补丁作业🙊","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2372,"height":3738,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220908/2022090812292756195287.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第七十八天，复习威，开启如，但明放弃如。今天临字的时候，当写完第一个威字，便很快乐，心里感觉临的挺像了。于是果断开启了第二个字如，因为这两天有时间就会翻看字帖，我突然发现如字和威字有一个相同的部分，感觉这样的话也可以巩固威字，起到承上的作用，应该效果会挺好的，就这样在快乐中临完了一整页的字。然而，当我拍好照片，放大一看，突然感觉威字又不那么像了，好像差点意思，后来当把字帖放平与手机的威字进行对比观","hasMore":true}

{"images":[{"width":2782,"height":3852,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220907/2022090711581386518776.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2321,"height":3741,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220907/2022090711581298345201.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1236,"height":2474,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220907/2022090711581369343333.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第七十七天，有时间一定要翻看自己之前的作业，真的会有不一样的感受。而这给我最大的感受就是：哭着哭着就笑了，笑着笑着就哭了。何出此言？原因如下：会感觉来时路不容易，会被自己所付出的微不足道地努力感动哭，会发现经过这每日痛苦的挣扎，写的又比以前好了些，会看到一点点成果，便会哭着哭着就笑了；然而，当翻看之前的作业也就会非常的不解，会出现小小的眼睛里有大大的疑惑，会不断的拷问，我之前怎么能写的如此之丑，我","hasMore":true}

{"images":[{"width":2368,"height":3796,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220906/2022090610025247968948.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第七十六天，虎年就是要多临威，虎虎生威！🥳","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2349,"height":3684,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220905/2022090511035206160348.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220905/2022090511035429418569.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第七十五天，精临让我着迷，越精临就越喜欢精临！之前总觉得快，便可以多临几个字，也自以为就会写的又快又好。殊不知，那是南辕北辙的练法，练书法快不得，那样只能是显多但不显精。最近，随着每日的只精临一字，慢慢地体会到了精临的美妙与益处，并认识到了一个字真是值得反复观察，细细品味，日复练习。以此，在今日与往日，今日中上个字与下个字，右边字与左边字，在每日、每排、每个字中不断发现之前的临摹缺点以及没发现的细","hasMore":true}

{"images":[{"width":2375,"height":3907,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220904/2022090410093763799638.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3906,"height":2926,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220904/2022090410093775920739.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第七十四天，忙碌，疲惫，明天再写那八个字了。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2508,"height":3862,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220903/2022090311360520568249.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3906,"height":2926,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220903/2022090311360580453409.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第七十三天，好飘的字，好歪的线条。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2928,"height":3904,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220902/2022090208444694668648.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3906,"height":2926,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220902/2022090208444671767746.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第七十二天，今天比较忙，仅全身贯注写两个字。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2526,"height":3907,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220901/2022090111042308771780.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第七十一天，以欢喜之心，慢度日常。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2401,"height":3817,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220831/2022083105143337858931.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3782,"height":2518,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220831/2022083105143558010537.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第七十天，是练习《峄山碑》的第20天。\n感悟：第一：这些天时间紧，每天练的不多，但经过这些天单字临摹和少量练习，突然后知后觉发现了之前所忽略的问题，明白了为什么之前横竖的尾部完善不好，很多时候总是到结尾的时候发现毛笔分叉聚拢不了，那是因为把笔按死了，在练习的过程中过度乐观，就忽略了细节。并且，这些天的某一天我突然用蝉翼毛边纸练横线竖线，暂且抛开间距、弯度不说，发现我的横竖写的非常毛躁，但是当我换成","hasMore":true}

{"images":[{"width":2397,"height":3639,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220830/2022083005205641453950.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2928,"height":3904,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220830/2022083005205628685502.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第六十九天，突然感受到了重复练一个字的美妙。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2313,"height":3568,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220829/2022082911434276632346.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第六十八天，是忙碌的一天，差的还远。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2558,"height":3754,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220828/2022082804160615945192.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2529,"height":3902,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220828/202208280416071628162.jpg","idx":1},{"width":2525,"height":3902,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220828/2022082804160664753727.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第六十七天，今日的手和笔就是最熟悉的陌生人。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2553,"height":3801,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220827/2022082707504558290705.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3072,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220827/2022082707504839555590.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3072,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220827/2022082707504758451329.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第六十六天，学海无涯，回头是岸啊~~谢谢老师的及时点拨帮助我改正追求速度的坏毛病。从今往后，一天一个字，近期：威，老师啥时候说行了，我啥时候练别的字。不着急了，慢慢来。为啥第五十九天自己说的目标，竟然这几天忘掉了，真不应该啊，万万不可做思想上的巨人，行动上的矮子。今天翻看之前作业，突然发现每隔几天就要快一次，不知道脑袋和手是怎么想的，幸好每当要快的时候老师及时的制止了我，不然学东西又要浅尝辄止了。","hasMore":true}

{"images":[{"width":3904,"height":2537,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220826/202208260806379667771.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2618,"height":3892,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220826/2022082608063674891211.jpg","idx":1},{"width":2538,"height":3739,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220826/2022082608063620727745.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":6,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第六十五天，今日思考走出来的第一步是先承认并清楚的认识到自己的不足之处，承认我的愚笨，所以必须要有多加练习的支持。人生如铁，百炼成钢，坚不可摧；书法如树，千练扎根，万练繁茂。唯有打好基础，才能经风雨而屹立不倒，更才能欣欣向荣硕果累累。与其百思不得其解，不如大干一场，从反复试错中获得经验，排除错误，边想边练，边练边想，练的时候不必执着，别害怕，放松些，继续从随心所欲中找感觉，让自然而然之感从自由中产","hasMore":true}

{"images":[{"width":2535,"height":3809,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220825/2022082511311509944470.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2596,"height":3863,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220825/2022082511311637098723.jpg","idx":1},{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220825/2022082511312083222592.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":9,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第六十四天，慢下来，不追求速度和数量，追求质量，寻找手感。要把线条写踏实点，不要漂浮，也不要笨拙，更不要臃肿，最不要无力无骨，关键就在于还是要寻找松而不懈&提中有按感。（好似圈、弯、弧……，只要涉及到有弧度的线条，都貌似与我有仇，又好似我练的不够，还似我不会提按，还似我过于死板，还似我没有果断，还似我总下笔飘忽不定……，貌似又要开始原地踏步了，不知何时能走出这里）","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2566,"height":3715,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220824/2022082412362206120943.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2560,"height":3806,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220824/2022082412362591187860.jpg","idx":1},{"width":2805,"height":3553,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220824/2022082412362273981446.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":6,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第六十三天，明天要不断提醒自己注意笔尖，不管写的如何，一定要下笔坚定。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2445,"height":3645,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220823/2022082303092422382932.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2450,"height":3635,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220823/202208230309243251356.jpg","idx":1},{"width":2596,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220823/2022082303092628220436.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第六十二天，心不在焉，线条毫无力度可言，差的还远。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2535,"height":3812,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220822/2022082201034561221889.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2498,"height":3633,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220822/2022082201034570368690.jpg","idx":1},{"width":2457,"height":3730,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220822/2022082201034532632071.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":6,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第六十一天，思考如何与生命相处的问题。复习俩字，新练俩字。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220821/2022082104305100239891.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220821/2022082104305103074397.jpg","idx":1},{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220821/2022082104305228783949.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第六十天，我希望成为一个心里平静的人。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2494,"height":3760,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220820/2022082006194311754663.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2452,"height":3714,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220820/2022082006194200340773.jpg","idx":1},{"width":2521,"height":3866,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220820/2022082006194217520517.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":6,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第五十九天，有机会一定要再锥画沙几次，去感受棍子与沙子的阻力，尤其是沙子中带有石子，真有助于增长功力啊，一下就感觉写的线条不那么软弱了（除了竖线，练竖线时脑袋胡思乱想了），不知道是不是心理作用哈哈哈，老师说的真对：讲再多不如自己体会，也牛老师就是牛！前天感悟受老师点拨：练的字，最好精临，抓住一个字，临到一模一样。老师说的对，其实慢就是快，幸好老师及时发现我又要追求速度的坏毛病，并及时点拨我，不然我","hasMore":true}

{"images":[{"width":2928,"height":3904,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220819/2022081911005306079304.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3906,"height":2926,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220819/2022081911005601332307.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3906,"height":2926,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220819/2022081911005471765254.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":9,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第五十八天，今天写的有点差，但体验不错。宣纸的是昨晚写的，很差！昨功力大减，体力不济，越画圈圈就越难过，用一个月练习的圈圈就败给了三天没练，现在都没法画的大小一致。我也是服我自己了，差的还远。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2529,"height":3902,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220818/2022081805361669975275.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2490,"height":3695,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220818/2022081805361500537693.jpg","idx":1},{"width":2708,"height":3904,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220818/2022081805361747081082.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":6,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第五十七天，在寻找最大限度地线条拉扯感。今天感到了莫名的压抑，可能也和阴天有些关系，我的内心掀起了好大的波澜，一想到开学有好多重大考试，紧张，烦躁，恐慌，愁上心头。不过幸好练上字之后平静了许多，心情也逐渐变好。\n第一：这些天有一天家里烧烤时，注意到了烧烤刷油刷酱的刷子，突然感觉它也像一支毛笔，便产生点灵感，我就想如果我在画圈圈的时候能用这个刷子，那么整个圈圈的宽窄粗细将会是一样的，这样画起来将非常","hasMore":true}

{"images":[{"width":2605,"height":3755,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220817/2022081701452948256999.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2589,"height":3902,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220817/2022081701452490831963.jpg","idx":1},{"width":2486,"height":3600,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220817/2022081701452509327684.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":9,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第五十六天，真不知道最近我在害怕什么，精神总紧张，写字不放松，常憋气状态，感觉很不佳，脑袋短路，无任何感想。花有重开日，人无再少年啊，感觉这一周都被荒废了，不行，不应该这样。真对不起我的时间，接下来近期要仔细体会老师教的：练习单字，还是因为对结构的关注，分散了写线条时候的注意力，导致线条质量达不到画横竖线时候的质感。 画横竖线条时候对于结构的要求没有，而专心一志于线条，所以质量好。 所以还是没有到","hasMore":true}

{"images":[{"width":2619,"height":3843,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220816/2022081603443198654486.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2611,"height":3799,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220816/202208160344320694765.jpg","idx":1},{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220816/2022081603443678750356.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":6,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第五十五天，今日思考如何呈现出线条的刚劲有利之感，并让字富有精气神。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220815/2022081502471460477514.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220815/20220815024715344840.jpg","idx":1},{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220815/2022081502471725048063.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":9,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第五十四天，练书法的路并不孤独，有老师和同学们的陪伴，还有妈妈的每日支持。我写的每日感悟和作业她都会准时进行阅读与欣赏。（ps：最后一张是她教我写字，画√的红色线条也是她写的，我为之一振，感觉好有天赋啊，能赶上我第七天练的横，就在那一刻，本就这两天没手感的我，又突然更没了自信。结果她浅浅的说了一句，天天看着看着好像就会了，你别看我没练过，但练线条有那么难吗？我感觉我练几天应该就能写的溜直，那一刻我","hasMore":true}

{"images":[{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220814/2022081409491270584570.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220814/2022081409491250927918.jpg","idx":1},{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220814/2022081409491399135376.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":8,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第五十三天，退步容易进步难，努力找回那马上就要失去的一丝手感！自我感觉没有极专注，也没有进入状态，手上功夫不熟练，差，极差！这几天断断续续的练习，感觉本来之前疏通的脉络好像又被堵住了，加上这些天外出也累，没睡好觉，精神有些紧张，不那么放松，胸口也好像被堵住了一样，不通顺，不管怎么写也不出汗了，浑身难受，练字好像成为了每天的必需必备必须，一天不练都难受，尤其是被一些无关紧要的事情耽误了更难受，这样不","hasMore":true}

{"images":[{"width":2834,"height":3882,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220813/2022081312242945163640.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":3815,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220813/2022081312243057724821.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3072,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220813/202208131224325969941.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":9,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第五十二天，明天又要出远门，卡先打了！（字是最后写的，有些困了，不在状态，写的很丑）","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2554,"height":3811,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220812/2022081202560412796954.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3072,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220812/2022081202560570846486.jpg","idx":1},{"width":2540,"height":3696,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220812/202208120256073483201.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":9,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第五十一天，两天没练，手感减退，感觉写的字笨手笨脚的，写字还莫名紧张上了，明天继续看心法修心。《增广贤文》劝学篇：一日练，一日功，一日不练，十日空。（ps：做我的手和给我当毛毡真辛苦，感谢包容与帮助）","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3265,"height":2653,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220811/2022081112040773553552.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3265,"height":2653,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220811/202208111204068912706.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3265,"height":2653,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220811/2022081112041067056707.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":9,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第五十天，打卡不能停，只能用手机写了，好丑！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3072,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220810/2022081012020048222023.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220810/2022081012020146798436.jpg","idx":1},{"width":4096,"height":2304,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220810/2022081012015885569374.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":6,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第四十九天\n感悟：第一：这几天内心无比的平静与自由，接着练习圈圈，在此基础上某天加上了弧线的练习，突然明显的感觉到自己的进步，画弧线比之前有手感了，并且感觉画出的线条比以前看着更加踏实有力。好像写的也没那么丑了，好神奇啊。但我觉得还得继续看心法修心，虽然现在每天的感觉就是能快速的平静下来，专注。这种感觉还是挺奇妙的，但是我觉得手上的功夫还是不够，其实一个笔画或者是一件事做成什么样，自己心里是有评分","hasMore":true}

{"images":[{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220809/2022080905520802988867.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3072,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220809/2022080905520757878435.jpg","idx":1},{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220809/2022080905520924414425.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":9,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第四十八天，今天脑袋里无限循环篆籀笔意一以贯之🙈。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3072,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220808/202208080926546544411.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3072,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220808/2022080809265512869410.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3072,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220808/2022080809265714628083.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":8,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第四十七天，不知练字是否能美容养颜，感觉这段时间气色不错，并且脸上的痘痘在不知不觉中也少了好多。最重要的是感觉练书法大大提高了我的睡眠质量，不知为何，每天都睡得格外香甜！！！另外，对于竖线忽高忽低的颜值能勉强接受，但有些不理解，肯定是还练的不够，没熟练！不能乱，不能慌，明继续看心法修心！（ps：今天竖线加练失败，被一些事情破坏了😭😭😭，希望别再有束缚自由的所谓“家庭聚会”了，结果安排了一堆不","hasMore":true}

{"images":[{"width":3072,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220807/2022080706272087153682.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4096,"height":2304,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220807/2022080706271894611716.jpg","idx":1},{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220807/2022080706271987345551.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第四十六天，笔、手、心继续磨合。提中有按，按中有提；提按有度，逢转必提。写字的时候，以身置字，融心神于笔尖，体验当一支毛笔的感觉。同时，要注意锋面的切换。虽随心所欲但不能乱，是在寻找一种对各个笔划的排版能乱，但心不能乱，手不能停的放松感。（ps：1.我特想立刻马上把我不好用又稀又洇的墨水和画圈的纸背全部统统用完写完。2.今天有事练不上竖了，明天加练。）","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220806/2022080601551319144435.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220806/2022080601551548055168.jpg","idx":1},{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220806/2022080601551590268875.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":9,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第四十五天，勤俭节约，随心所欲，寻找感觉。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220805/2022080504582481882786.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220805/2022080504582523931389.jpg","idx":1},{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220805/2022080504582515866133.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":6,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第四十四，心如止水，然后把我的心交给我的手。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220804/2022080410283923038147.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220804/2022080410284253717162.jpg","idx":1},{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220804/2022080410284266372787.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":6,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第四十三天，我即是笔，笔即是我。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220803/2022080302515415898272.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":3299,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220803/2022080302515287169645.jpg","idx":1},{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220803/2022080302515460155321.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":6,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第四十二天，全身出汗。\n感悟：第一：不知不觉，专心画圈圈已经17天了，虽然画的没有很完美，但从手感上我能感觉到比之前练的杂时，画的好多了。要不是老师点拨我，让我专心画圈圈，我想再有一个月我也画不好，也没法进步。也让我明白了，有些时候并不是闷头学习，努力就行了。方向不对，努力白费。后来偶然间也从小红书上看到了一个视频，大概就是说学习书法中，可能会遇到很多问题。但是他解决的办法就是每次只解决一个问题。","hasMore":true}

{"images":[{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220802/2022080202574236182016.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220802/2022080202574114612990.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3246,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220802/202208020257432431479.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":6,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第四十一天，还是没能孰能生巧，得继续练，差的还远。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220801/2022080105160331173103.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220801/2022080105160435712550.jpg","idx":1},{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220801/202208010516051589933.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":6,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第四十天，放松放松不憋气，起笔收笔莫着急。思考、尝试如何把圈圈四条线写的宽窄一致，既细些且有力道。今天汗流浃背，画圈圈终于能慢下来，不仓促了。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220731/2022073103433701716221.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220731/2022073103433660757334.jpg","idx":1},{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220731/2022073103433818352197.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":6,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第三十九天，继续修心，期待神情自若的那天~","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220730/2022073003563578946697.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220730/2022073003555913477273.jpg","idx":1},{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220730/2022073003555927119686.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":6,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第三十八天，复看心法，注意笔尖，放松心态。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2201,"height":3671,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220729/2022072912365574957369.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2547,"height":3542,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220729/2022072912365170156245.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3755,"height":2356,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220729/2022072912365742582718.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":6,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第三十七天，昨天的感觉非常美妙，本以为今天的圈圈会像是吃了德芙一样，纵享丝滑！结果并非如此。而正是这种进一天退一天的感觉，让我感到患得患失，才让我不断的想要突破。因此，要学着既不骄傲自满，也不妄自菲薄，果然矛盾是普遍的，而经过矛盾之后的否定之否定的过程也将会使我变成更好的我！\n之前读过一句话“人生而自由却无往不在枷锁之中。”由此得到灵感，先有自由，后有枷锁，应有一个先后顺序。所以，今天体会到画圈需","hasMore":true}

{"images":[{"width":2262,"height":3738,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220728/202207280327113385274.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2694,"height":3585,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220728/2022072803271194248743.jpg","idx":1},{"width":2321,"height":3921,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220728/2022072803271182896297.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":6,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第三十六天，圈生一，一生二，二生三，三生一串。抓住那灵光一现的感觉！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4096,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220727/2022072711292465640945.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220727/2022072711291959824909.jpg","idx":1},{"width":2898,"height":3864,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220727/202207271129090339488.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第三十五天，既然画不好，那就以退为进，从随心所欲中找感觉吧。\n感悟：第一：这七天，在不放弃练习横竖的基础上，我只练习了圈圈。其中，有一天受老师点拨，突然顿悟找到画圈的感觉。但由于我个人功夫没到家，所以之后的每天虽然内心感悟不变，但这种手感好像只减不增。这七天停滞不前的感觉，真的好可怕。但是这种感觉既让我害怕，又让我感觉我不应该停滞在这里，我应该努力克服它。所以，每天晚上睡觉前我都会反思为什么我就写","hasMore":true}

{"images":[{"width":2372,"height":3844,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220726/2022072601101405990109.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2328,"height":3808,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220726/2022072601102135620896.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第三十四天，老师说：矩形练习就是直线与练字之间的过渡，矩形除了写好拐弯只在，还要注意把整张纸上的矩形写到大小一致，横竖方向都对齐，这就是初步的对眼力的锻炼。而我现在，感觉质量提上去一点点，但对于大小一致和横竖方向都对齐，还没有做到，右弯也拐的不太好，所以，我需要用心体会老师的话，加上努力实践和不断反思问题，更重要的在于纠正，现在还差得远。还是练的不够，做的不到位。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2218,"height":3455,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220725/2022072502381762617664.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2103,"height":3521,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220725/2022072502381766456212.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第三十三天，期待与圈圈决斗的那一天！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2117,"height":2263,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220724/2022072401560302396138.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2773,"height":2879,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220724/2022072401560589610154.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第三十二天，人必须安静下来，才能听见内心的声音。从起床练到现在，就是没有满意的。这种停滞不前的感觉好可怕😱，为什么人脑想的和手上做的差这么多？是时候该好好反思反思了。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2449,"height":3265,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220723/2022072311275440989532.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2564,"height":3708,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220723/2022072311275408077781.jpg","idx":1},{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220723/2022072311275620760446.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第三十一天，明天继续看心法修心，本来今天想要完善的更好，反而写的更不好。老师教我的“不执着”要好好体会，我得慢慢学着接受✍🏻字中的“事与愿违”，但真的是差之毫厘，谬以千里啊！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3072,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220722/2022072202545608055296.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2265,"height":3934,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220722/2022072202545346993629.jpg","idx":1},{"width":4096,"height":2304,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220722/20220722025454682928.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":6,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第三十天，又是与圈圈做斗争的一天！质量好像微微上去了一点，但总体还是偏斜上，大小也不一，一个圈圈的四条线宽窄不一，明天继续完善！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220721/2022072105194085372317.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220721/2022072105194152236986.jpg","idx":1},{"width":4000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220721/2022072105194102211072.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第二十九天，今天写字好累，汗流不止。划了好多圈还是不满意，就这一张能看的😭，眼睛和手都斜，然后竖还不行，真的还是没熟能生巧，不能着急，继续修心，再用心实践一段。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4000,"height":2804,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220720/2022072004320023440165.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4096,"height":2304,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220720/2022072004320170935019.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220720/202207200432018287233.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":6,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第二十八天\n感悟：这七天同上一个七天相比，笔划的练习上仅横竖略有一点点进步但也有限，其他停滞不前。同时，新临了“立”“上”“王”“方”四个字，但还临不好。后来，经老师点拨，我发现还是基本功不扎实，决定从专心画圈开始。我也发现练字考验装备、考验手，考验心。不仅毛笔需要适应，宣纸也是需要适应的。还是没适应到位，要继续探索。这其中最根本考验的就是心。我的心不静，于是多次复看老师的心法好些，通读两天《清静","hasMore":true}

{"images":[{"width":4096,"height":2304,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220719/202207190244392272137.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4096,"height":2304,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220719/2022071902444237742667.jpg","idx":1},{"width":4096,"height":2304,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220719/202207190244453017549.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":6,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第二十七天，昨日老师点拨我，仔细体会矩形的写法：由静态（直线）进入动态（曲线转折），手臂的发力稳定性提高了一个难度，把静态的书写感用动态的状态写出来。今天对于矩形我好像豁然开朗，找到感觉了，虽然写的还不怎么好，明天尽力写好些。老师太🐮了！\n另：横竖起笔收笔没写好，线条还有波动，确实写横竖的时候，心里不太平静，总思绪乱飞，还得继续看心法修心。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2448,"height":3264,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220718/2022071803501425487265.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2255,"height":2832,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220718/2022071803501446885498.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3570,"height":2328,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220718/2022071803501668610724.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":9,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第二十六天，（横26，竖弧矩19，此方案结束。）今天我只练矩，不练弧和字了。昨天受老师点拨：要专。受到启发，要专、要钻、要精，不能博而不精，精而不博。（这只是个很夸大的说法，仅来表达我理解的这句话~）我也没精，我也没博。所以我现阶段应该先逐个突破精，再去谈博，也许就自然而然了。ps：今天在找更为放松感觉练习，所以好多张写的差上加差。希望有一天能够放松和高质量兼备。\n另注：1.应该学会适应不同纸，别","hasMore":true}

{"images":[{"width":4000,"height":2912,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220717/2022071711022777789460.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2553,"height":3667,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220717/202207171102263028483.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220717/2022071711022834383114.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":5,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第二十五天，横25，竖弧矩18。今天明显感觉到心态状态都不好，心里好像长了一堆草🌿，根本控制不了我那快速的行笔，复看心法，继续修心（这心态还是个青铜），看来心和手修的还不够，不要着急，平静下来，不要有波澜，心无杂念自然神！人能常清静，天地悉皆归！希望明天能平静下来！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2760,"height":3548,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220716/2022071603281140456791.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2521,"height":3585,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220716/2022071603280977282600.jpg","idx":1},{"width":2821,"height":3239,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220716/2022071603281040638741.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":6,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第二十四天，横24，竖弧矩17。复看心法，今天手腕不疼了（幸亏老师纠正的及时，不然就走火入魔了），也不发热了。从心里感觉慢慢生发出一种热来，老师说：只要放松没有不舒服就行，有可能是任脉真气凝聚了。看来得多加练习，复看心法，持续这种感觉，继续修心。昨晚梦到了一个人指导我练字，他说：你不要驼背、放松、慢慢写、别着急，然后他好像抓着我的手，教我竖怎么起笔。好像还教我别的来着，但我没记住（我猜测有可能与睡","hasMore":true}

{"images":[{"width":2471,"height":3558,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220715/2022071504175463090839.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3517,"height":2348,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220715/2022071504175460869190.jpg","idx":1},{"width":2580,"height":3755,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220715/2022071504175428435543.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":6,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第二十三天，横23，竖弧矩16。手腕放松，意念下移，注意笔尖。虽字极差，但今天把抓笔姿势和腕部的高低进行了完善，将意念下移当成努力的方向，好放松啊~（手腕竟然不疼了，感觉有一些发热，还有一种经络疏通、血脉流淌的感觉，好像能源源不断的发力也不累，不知道有这种感觉对不对，是不是好现象呢~）","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2428,"height":3535,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220714/2022071402455516231417.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3747,"height":2484,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220714/2022071402455615040414.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3632,"height":2663,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220714/2022071402455683412151.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":6,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第二十二天，横22，竖弧矩15。手腕放松，意念迁移，注意笔尖。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220713/2022071312142711386602.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":2942,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220713/2022071312142440937892.jpg","idx":1},{"width":4000,"height":2800,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220713/2022071312144781055452.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":6,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第二十一天，横21，竖弧矩14。\n感悟：与上个7天相比，有几天，感觉出字还是发飘。仔细分析，不能气馁，不是写不好，是练习的远远不够，是心不够持续平静，手不够持之以恒，反思不够付诸实践。\n第一：通过这些天的练习，我又对这些笔划有了新的认识、体会以及感悟，真是常练常新。这七天中的前两天还是用之前那根常用的毛笔，虽然横练了小半个月，但感觉线条的质量以及间距总完善不好，每天也发现这个问题，但第二天好像依旧","hasMore":true}

{"images":[{"width":2697,"height":3485,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220712/2022071212114348186275.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2664,"height":3463,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220712/202207121211436853904.jpg","idx":1},{"width":2438,"height":1950,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220712/2022071212114282034949.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":5,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第二十天，横20，竖弧矩13。复看心法，继续修心，要慢下来，要精致些。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2734,"height":2702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220711/2022071102410153586083.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2164,"height":3497,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220711/2022071102410029559087.jpg","idx":1},{"width":2388,"height":3865,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220711/2022071102410128924653.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":7,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第十九天，横19，竖弧矩12。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2766,"height":2782,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220710/2022071002553153520449.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2860,"height":2965,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220710/2022071002553139912877.jpg","idx":1},{"width":2813,"height":2809,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220710/2022071002553159043463.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第十八天，横18，竖弧矩11。人是我的人，笔是我的笔，但手好像不是我的手。（从起床开始练到现在都没有满意的，越来越浮躁，继续看心法，好好修心）（没有力道的笔划，不是好笔划）","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2472,"height":2435,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220709/2022070903504660613917.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2850,"height":2760,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220709/2022070903504642260789.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3039,"height":2763,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220709/2022070903504697992433.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":5,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第十七天，横17，竖弧矩10。（换了毛笔，还不适应，感觉写的超不精致的，而且起笔起不好还总是波动，明天继续看心法，和这毛笔也多多磨合）","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2691,"height":2702,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220708/2022070804411673578993.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2531,"height":3888,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220708/2022070804411697234655.jpg","idx":1},{"width":2558,"height":2484,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220708/2022070804411683432530.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":6,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第十六天，横16，竖弧矩9。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2701,"height":2730,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220707/2022070703074179429371.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":2871,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220707/2022070703074228099273.jpg","idx":1},{"width":2787,"height":2895,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220707/202207070307423412421.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":6,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第十五天，横15，竖弧矩8。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2505,"height":2515,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220706/2022070603074627970516.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2704,"height":2634,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220706/2022070603074640193269.jpg","idx":1},{"width":2548,"height":2614,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220706/2022070603074647074362.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第十四天，横14，竖弧矩7。细横难写。\n感悟：在7-12天，不知为何，我的心态很不好。每一天练字的心境是不一样的，虽然都会从不平静，渐渐地转为平静，但这其中的过程却很曲折。12-14天里，才逐渐步入正轨。\n第一：在七天之前的横划练习中倒是没有这么大的体会。我想可能是横确实比竖和弧好练，再可能就是刚练字的我内心体会不深。这些天我又练习了七天的横划，在横划的练习中，我每天总是感觉不够完美，尤其是前几天","hasMore":true}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":3053,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220705/2022070506333011639723.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":3014,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220705/2022070506332963664825.jpg","idx":1},{"width":2893,"height":2966,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220705/2022070506333013650267.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第十三天，横13，竖弧矩6。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2725,"height":2486,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220704/202207041118177617332.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3113,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220704/2022070411181789581205.jpg","idx":1},{"width":2629,"height":2559,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220704/2022070411181772563112.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第十二天，横12，竖弧矩5。复看心法，放平心态，慢慢来。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2283,"height":3641,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220703/2022070308155146312148.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3508,"height":2193,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220703/2022070308155122894065.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3710,"height":1967,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220703/2022070308155109790869.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第十一天，（是洇墨，也是字飘的一天π_π）横11，竖弧矩4。之前的每一天，一天走1步。前十天走10步，今天退了11步，是-1步。慢慢来~","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3907,"height":2084,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220702/202207020437455977998.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3940,"height":2014,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220702/2022070204374520842420.jpg","idx":1},{"width":2277,"height":3684,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220702/2022070204374548481659.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第十天，继续慢下来。横10，竖弧矩3。\n开始写字的时候还要戴眼镜，这两天居然不戴眼镜，也能看清楚起笔和线条了，练字把我眼睛练好了呢~🤪","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2069,"height":3658,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220701/2022070105372998117491.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3717,"height":2026,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220701/2022070105373023788851.jpg","idx":1},{"width":4000,"height":2666,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220701/2022070105373078610541.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第九天，重看视频，反思昨天写的有些快，今天慢下来。横9（明天完善间距和线条的宽窄），竖弧矩2。记住：慢下来~急不得~","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3992,"height":2277,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220630/2022063005250874623609.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3840,"height":2276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220630/2022063005250878544711.jpg","idx":1},{"width":2060,"height":3823,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220630/2022063005250868848993.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第八天，横8天，竖1天，矩1天。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1080,"height":1815,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220629/2022062911365615870653.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2173,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220629/2022062911365758359275.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第七天，练横。\n感悟：为期七天的横划练习，虽然依旧写的不怎么样，但内心的收获不少。\n第一：尤其是体会到了老师讲的“人能常清静，天地悉皆归。”每次练字的时候都会把我从不怎么平静的状态拉回到平静，让我能够十分享受练横的过程。深刻的体会到了平静带来的好处，它能够让我听到内心的声音，让我放松，让我平静，不要胡思乱想，一心把字写好，更让我在练字之后生出了一点点智慧，也让我进行了一些思考。比如从横其表看，给人","hasMore":true}

{"images":[{"width":2431,"height":3792,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220628/2022062809230222334255.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220628/2022062809301690435273.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第六天，一张横，体会到了藏锋起笔的以柔克刚和蓄力持续。逐渐可以一次性的拉完一整根线条，不足的是在线条的最后，想要完善一下末端，但毛笔却很毛躁，聚拢不成中锋。不知道是不是我在拉线条的过程中用力太大了的原因。","hasMore":false}
